column5: I'm looking to order some Pumpkin orange Vinyl jig paint made by Component systems.  Cant find it at bass pro shops or my local tackle shop  can someone point me in the right direction Thanks
If you don't mind doing business online, these are the folks I use:  http://www.lurecraft.com/catalog.cfm/mater...~and~-jig-paint
Do not know for sure, but look here, they seem to have everything:  http://www.luremaking.com/
